topic.title: Modifying langlist.xml to add a new language

body.note: This assumes you are working on a copy of the 'strings' folder, either in a customization or a folder located using the 'mmpdf:localization-strings.dir' build parameter.
body.p: To add a support for a new xml:lang value which is not in the DITA-OT by default, first create a new language localization files in the strings folder, and register them by adding <lang> entries to the langlist.xml file. This section describes adding support for Tamil, language code 'ta' but the principle can be applied to any language supported by the MiramoPDF composition engine.
